personal.name: Alex Rodriguez
personal.title: Full Stack Web Developer
personal.tagline: Crafting digital experiences with modern technologies
personal.bio: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with 5+ years of experience building scalable web applications. I love turning complex problems into simple, beautiful solutions that provide exceptional user experiences.

projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: A modern e-commerce solution built with React and Node.js, featuring real-time inventory management and payment processing.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, drag-and-drop functionality, and team collaboration features.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: A responsive weather dashboard with location-based forecasts, interactive maps, and historical weather data visualization.

experience.description: Lead development of scalable web applications using React, Node.js, and AWS. Mentored junior developers and architected microservices infrastructure.
Built and maintained e-commerce platform serving 10k+ users. Implemented payment systems and real-time inventory management.
Developed responsive websites and web applications for various clients. Collaborated with design teams to implement pixel-perfect interfaces.
Provided web development services to small businesses. Created custom websites and helped clients establish their online presence.
